portfolio_payment_fee_label.tooltip: This label will be shown in all order overviews where this payment fee is used.

portfolio_max_amount_new_customers.label: Maximum Amount for New AfterPay Customers
portfolio_max_amount_new_customers.comment: N.B. This value does not influence whether or not this portfolio is available. This is only used as a label!

order_status_acceptedni.label: Status Accepted No Invoice
order_status_acceptedni.comment: New is the default state for a new order without invoice.
order_status_acceptedni.tooltip: For administrative purposes a new status can be created connected to processing.

order_status_pending.label: Status Pending
order_status_pending.comment: Pending is the default state for a new order.
order_status_pending.tooltip: For administrative purposes a new status can be created connected to new.

order_status_accepted.label: Status Accepted
order_status_accepted.comment: Processing is the default state for an order with an invoice or a shipment.
order_status_accepted.tooltip: For administrative purposes a new status can be created connected to processing.

order_status_refused.label: Status Refused
order_status_refused.comment: Canceled is the default state for an unprocessed order terminated.
order_status_refused.tooltip: For administrative purposes a new status can be created connected to Canceled.

allowspecific.label: Allowed Countries
allowspecific.tooltip: Select whether all countries may make use of this payment option, or only specific countries.

specificcountry.label: Payment from Specific Country
specificcountry.comment: Only available if 'Payment from applicable countries' is set to 'specific countries'.
specificcountry.tooltip: Define which countries are allowed to make use of this portfolio.

allowspecific_customers.label: Allowed Client groups
allowspecific_customers.tooltip: Select whether all customers may make use of this payment option, or only customers from specific customer groups.

specificcustomers.label: Specific client groups
specificcustomers.comment: Only available if 'Allowed Client groups' is set to 'specific client groups'.
specificcustomers.tooltip: Define which client groups are allowed to make use of this portfolio.

notallowedshippingmethods.label: Not allowed by shipping methods
notallowedshippingmethods.comment: Select all the shipping methods where the AfterPay module should NOT be allowed for.
notallowedshippingmethods.tooltip: Use CTRL + mouseclick to select multiple entries.

advisoryprocess.label: Advisory process
advisoryprocess.comment: Select Yes to enable advisory process.
advisoryprocess.tooltip: Only use in cooperation with AfterPay

sort_order.label: Sort order
sort_order.tooltip: This value will determine in what order the portfolio's will appear to the customer

capture_mode.label: Capture Mode
capture_mode.tooltip: Select whether AfterPay will automatically attempt to capture the order or if the module should manually attempt to capture the order.

capture_delay_days.label: Capture delay
capture_delay_days.tooltip: Select the amount of days AfterPay will wait after capturing the order, before the invoice is sent to the customer.

order_status_accepted.label: Status Capture Request Accepted
order_status_accepted.tooltip: For administrative purposes a new status can be created connected to processing.

order_status_refused.label: Status Capture Request Refused
order_status_refused.tooltip: For administrative purposes a new status can be created connected to Canceled.

enabled.label: Enable refunding
enabled.tooltip: If you set this to 'No', you will only ber able to perform offline refunds on AfterPay transactions
